Articles.Content:
Introducing: Beme.

a new social media platform made by Casey Neistat and his friends. 2 years in the making. Beme's motto is "Share video, Honestly", and boy do they mean it when they say honestly. no editing, just record, and it's posted. no filters. just uncut, unfiltered, uncensored(as in cursing, nudity is banned) content.

Over all i rate Beme 10/10 (with exceptions, it is almost brand new)

It's IOS8+ and Android is coming out within a few weeks/days.

Anyone got Beme? (I can't i only have an iPhone 4)
